last_episode_to_air.name: Barcelona
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Jesse Ray Beaumont's trial begins, the team struggles to keep him under control while they discover more of Lavinia's secrets. Now that the baby is born and awaiting the DA election results, Carol Anne discovers who is the baby's father.

name: Trial & Error
overview: A bright-eyed New York lawyer takes his first big case defending an eccentric poetry professor accused of murdering his wife.

seasons.name: Lady, Killer
seasons.overview: The second season centers on bright-eyed New York lawyer Josh Segal, still relatively a newcomer in a tiny southern town, who is sturdily posed for his next big case there. His mission? To defend the eccentric first lady of East Peck, Lavinia Peck-Foster, known for her flamboyant outfits, large hats and hairless cat, and who suddenly finds herself accused of the bizarre murder of her beloved husband.

tagline: Their first case is a real killer

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: When rollercizing poetry professor Larry Henderson is arrested for the brutal murder of his wife, bright-eyed lawyer Josh Segal comes down from New York to the quirky town of East Peck, South Carolina to defend his first big case. After meeting his eccentric client and odd-ball team, Josh quickly realizes he's in over his head.

episodes.name: A Wrench in the Case
episodes.overview: In trying to find an alternate theory to Larry throwing his wife through the window, Josh and his team discover another man's DNA in the bedroom, possibly leading to another suspect. Meanwhile, Josh is concerned about Larry's lack of emotion about the murder and his strange obsession with a skate wrench.

episodes.name: The Other Man
episodes.overview: After coming up bust on a match to the DNA found in Larry's bedroom, Josh and his team discover a "sex print" on the wall that leads to a new suspect. Meanwhile, Josh gets sloppy and inadvertently gives a piece of damning evidence to the prosecution.

episodes.name: An Unwelcome Distraction
episodes.overview: When the new suspect turns up in a coma, Josh becomes sidetracked trying to solve this crime, eventually becoming a suspect himself. Meanwhile, prosecutor Carol Anne Keane presents the autopsy report, which reveals Larry's wife was struck by a blunt object, leading to a frantic search for the murder weapon.

episodes.name: Right-Hand Man
episodes.overview: A bright-eyed New York lawyer heads to a tiny Southern town for his first big case, which is to defend an eccentric “rollercizing” poetry professor who is accused of the bizarre...

episodes.name: Secrets & Lies
episodes.overview: A bright-eyed New York lawyer heads to a tiny Southern town for his first big case, which is to defend an eccentric “rollercizing” poetry professor who is accused of the bizarre.....

episodes.name: The Case Gets Big
episodes.overview: As Josh prepares for trial, his boss, Mr. Mankiewicz comes down from New York to check up on him and reveals a gigantic hole in Josh's case. Meanwhile, Larry, unsettled by his rift with his daughter and Josh's boss being in town, takes matters into his own hands, with deadly consequences.

episodes.name: A Change In Defense
episodes.overview: With the trial now getting national attention, Josh's boss, Mr. Mankiewicz has decided to take over the case, throwing the team into turmoil. Meanwhile, when Mankiewicz suggests Larry plead insanity, Josh and Carol Anne Keane must work together to convince Larry to stand trial.

episodes.name: Opening Statements
episodes.overview: A bright-eyed New York lawyer heads to a tiny Southern town for his first big case, which is to defend an eccentric “rollercizing” poetry professor who is accused of the bizarre.....

episodes.name: A Hostile Jury
episodes.overview: A bright-eyed New York lawyer heads to a tiny Southern town for his first big case, which is to defend an eccentric “rollercizing” poetry professor who is accused of the bizarre...

episodes.name: Unusual Suspect
episodes.overview: After the prosecution presents its case for 28 grueling days, Josh's defense suffers a major setback when Summer turns into a suspect. When Larry forbids Josh from putting Summer on the stand, Josh must decide how much he's willing to sacrifice to get Larry his freedom.

episodes.name: The Defense Rests
episodes.overview: As Josh focuses on making his final case before closing arguments, he takes a huge gamble by putting Larry on the stand. Despite hiring the best witness coach in the South to train him, Larry's testimony leads to a shocking discovery about Larry's past that may be too difficult to overcome.

episodes.name: The Verdict
episodes.overview: The trial is over and the verdict is finally announced. A key piece of evidence is found that answers the question, "Who killed Margaret Henderson".

episodes.name: The Suitcase
episodes.overview: Josh Segal defends Lavinia Peck-Foster, the eccentric First Lady of East Peck who is accused of killing her husband. But when bodies pile up, there are more questions than answers.

episodes.name: The Timeline
episodes.overview: Josh and the team are forced to seek help from two unlikely sources - the convicted murderer of Lavinia's brother and the host of a popular murder podcast called M-Town.

episodes.name: The Murder Clock
episodes.overview: Josh's team continues to hunt for the potential murder weapon that would seal their timeline. The case takes a dramatic turn as their search leads them to two new suspects and some shocking news about Lavinia.

episodes.name: A Hole in the Case
episodes.overview: As the trial begins, Josh and his team experience some hiccups in proving Lavinia's innocence to the judge. As soon as Josh thinks he's been able to find cause for dismissal of the case, Carol Anne argues to test the timeline herself, leading them to uncover a hidden passageway on Lavinia's property.

episodes.name: A Change in the Team
episodes.overview: Dwayne testifies on the prosecution's behalf and dismantles the timeline they established; Lavinia pressures Josh to fire Dwayne; Dwayne redeems himself when he stumbles on a big break in the case.

episodes.name: New Case, Old Murder
episodes.overview: After winning Lavinia's case, the town finally embraces Josh; Josh agonizes over whether Lavinia may have done it and tries to open an old case.

episodes.name: A Family Affair
episodes.overview: With Jesse Ray Beaumont's retrial looming, the team looks into Lavinia's past to gain fresh insight into the case.

episodes.name: Bad Instincts
episodes.overview: Josh struggles with his defense for Jesse Ray Beaumont; Dwayne enjoys his new life as a Peck.

episodes.name: A Big Break
episodes.overview: Josh and his team continue to find themselves at literal dead ends in their casework until they unearth game-changing evidence with the help of Jesse Ray Beaumont. Meanwhile, in court, Carol Anne tries to finish the case before she has the baby.

episodes.name: Barcelona
episodes.overview: As Jesse Ray Beaumont's trial begins, the team struggles to keep him under control while they discover more of Lavinia's secrets. Now that the baby is born and awaiting the DA election results, Carol Anne discovers who is the baby's father.

2.name: Lady, Killer
2.overview: The second season centers on bright-eyed New York lawyer Josh Segal, still relatively a newcomer in a tiny southern town, who is sturdily posed for his next big case there. His mission? To defend the eccentric first lady of East Peck, Lavinia Peck-Foster, known for her flamboyant outfits, large hats and hairless cat, and who suddenly finds herself accused of the bizarre murder of her beloved husband.
